name: Star Plotter
description:
Your universe needs creating, and only you can bring it to life!

Star Plotter is a fun casual game set in a tiny space ship. Fly through space in your ship and plot your own beautiful universe. The bigger the star, the better! But be careful not to touch your creations, they are much hotter than you expected!

All good creators need a challenge! Fly through space in Challenge or Endless mode to see the highest score you can achieve under pressure. But is this too difficult for you? Try Creative mode for a relaxing time while creating your galaxy. No timers. No need to avoid your stars! Just pure enjoyment of creation!

Hand crafted by Liam Hotinski,  the solo developer behind Star Plotter, Liam invites you to explore a new universe of your own creation brimming with vibrant colours, magical stars, a beautiful and unique art style, and ethereal music. 

Features:

  • Plot your universe and scatter the stars into the sky.
  • Layout your own constellations.
  • 3 exciting game modes.
  • Get the highest score in the universe.
  • Enjoy a unique and alien soundtrack.
  • Customise your tiny space ship.

For more information you can visit the official website at silvermiststudios.net
